code: import axios from'axios';export const sendOtp=async phone=>{return await axios.post('http://3.108.66.202:5000/api/send-otp',{phone});};export const verifyOtp=async(phone,otp)=>{const response=await axios.post('http://3.108.66.202:5000/api/verify-otp',{phone,otp});return response.data.success;};
